column4: how do I sudo apt-get install a .tar.bz2 file (firefox 4, got it directly from the mozilla site)?
you can also install firefox 4 with the ppa
for the FF4 factiod: sudo apt-add-repository ppa:mozillateam/firefox-stable && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
